review: My review is based on the service I got after my bag where missing for almost 3 days. For those of you who want the short version: LATAM can t give any information when bags are being dropped are your place when they locate those. That means:I had to stay the hole day and evening and night in my appartement...
Excellent service. Entretainment onboard also good. Good duty free variety. Food was good. Delicious crackers.

We flew a total of 6 flights on our trip to south America, all on LAN or LATAN. I like the service and planes were newish Seats were average but not too close together in coach. Food was basic, but free beer/vine on international flights. I like the schedule from/to LAX overnight flights to Peru or Chile, regional flights. This...

quote: i will avoid all LATAM flights
review:
I booked this flight throush Sky tours and some how latam changed the flight time from 1 pm to 9am that morning. Latam says they notified sky tours, and sky tours says they did not get notified.
What that mean for me was sitting at the airoport for 9 + hours and losing a day with my family
Great flight! Comfortable seats, great selection of films etc., best plane food I've ever had and the staff were very friendly! I recommend them!!

The three flights were pretty good and the food was great, but there was a problem with my bag and Iberia was unable to retrieve it from Latam to send it to the final destination. It's been 3 days and no one responds my demands, saying its the other airline or the airport's fault. The bag is in Madrid still...

Only negative thing was having to collect checked in bag at Lima just to check it back in again even if the airline was the same. Oh, and short legroom. Other than that the flight was smooth and the service good.

quote: Reasonable price, but we bid and won upgrade to Premium class, it was worth the extra
review: Bid on and got upgrade to Premium economy, so no hassle about 3rd bag, weight of other two bags, towel, drink, lunch, it was a cold lunch but good, and the wine was ok.

Flight 603 on February 27th was my first time with LAN aka LATAM airlines. My wife and I both think that the service, attitude and overall performance an outstanding experience.
When we changed planes in Santiago to flight 449 the service and attitude was equal. This left us with the belief that it is an airline that employees like to...

LATAM flight 2422 to Lima was cancelled on 1/3/17 routed their passengers to Santiago. Very poor customer service in Cordoba and Santiago. In Cordoba LATAM personnel had 5 hours to re-book passengers and they only did half of the plane. We arrived to Santiago (not our destination) without knowing how we were going to get to Lima. Finally, someone at...

quote: Business class overbooked and forced to travel in a lesser class
review:
We've booked about 9 months ahead in Business class with a 75 pitch lie-flat seat on a 787-9 and were denied this paid reservation. They only offered a 31 pitch seat on a A319 instead.
Neither per Email nor phone they were able to give at least a reason and denied our original booking.

This was second time I had an issue with the check in. Today I reached the AEP 2 hours and 15 minutes to catch 12:45 flight. The window for International check in was from 55-59 and the line was all the way pass information center, outside of check in hall. There was no bag drop area. I was told the...

quote: When everything is well, this airline shines, but when there's ANY problem....
review:
I have flown with LAN/LATAM many many times, and everything is pretty nice, personnel is generally nice, the dreamliner airplane is amazing, even in economy, and baggage handling is appropriate. However, there's 2 black spots they need to sort out.
1.- When anything goes wrong, be it turbulence, delays, baggage problems, you name it, I really mean ANYTHING, this airplane...
Great service. Loved the food. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to have a comfortable flight.

Have never travelled with Lan long haul and certai lu it will be the only one I would travel on .from start to finish the whole team are absolutely perfect . Prior to departureand my husband call them regarding assistance and they immediately have us out away numbers u like most airlines we have to either pay or wait I...

This was one of the worst experiences I have ever had and I often fly internationally.
I was booked on the last evening flight from Cuzco to Lima departing @ 7:15pm to make my international connection with Delta @ 00:50. After boarding and waiting almost 45 minutes on the plane an announcement was made in Spanish and I noticed all...
I liked the configuration ie 2 seats on the outside sides of the cabin, very smooth journey very good service/food, time passed very quickly

I fly LAN fairly regularly, and they're very helpful, especially traveling with my service dog. The flights are rarely off schedule (helps to have pretty constant, moderate weather conditions) The snack boxes on the short-hops are just about perfect, for killing time & having a little nibble.
The attendants are always very gracious; never had a snarly one, like you...

quote: Mixed help when ill but overall a decent airline
review:
We took several flights with LAN whilst travelling in South America.
The planes were clean and comfortable. Average legroom and food. Check-in efficient.
Unfortunately I was ill when travelling from La Paz to Quito via Lima. The staff onboard the flight from La Paz to Quito were extremely helpful and sat me in Business Class where I slept for the...

Nice airline with decent staff and about average seat wise. Would we use again....yes. The flight was interesting as I had a window seat and my companion was a lovely Japanese Tour guide who hated flying!!.

Having flown with this airline for the first time in 2015, and been pleasantly surprised, I had no hesitation in booking all my South American flights with them. From Santiago to Lima, Cusco, Peurto Maldanado and back to Lima (all in Peru), and then from Santiago to Punta Arenas and return, all flights were pleasant, efficient with friendly flight crew,...

quote: Always great services and good entertainment
review: Always that I can I choose LAN, basically because the onboard personal are very kind and good at his job. Also the entertainment is very good and independent for everyone so you can choose what you see instead of using a common screen. The only problem lately is that the new Dreamliner aeroplanes are configured with the seats a little...

We were very happy with this long haul from Auckland to Santiago. (We also had an excellent flight from Santiago to Lima on LAN.) Their new 787's are very well appointed and lay-flat seats in Business Class make sleeping easy. Excellent food as well. Check-in & luggage service were easy and well done.

The aircraft was the new dreamliner, and even tho the companys name is LATAM, still there is a difference between LAN and TAM aircrafts, I flew with LAN.
The food was great for economy, they had excellent wine, and offered beverages for more than an hour continuously.
The service was excellent, one of the best in the market, with very...

At difference of my last flight on these airline, this time its being very different. On board people very nice ant attend to passengers, the isle mater was de the AC to low, but they offer me a extra blanket so I could rest well. I was a night flight.

Our ticket was purchased through Oceania cruise line. We flew on LAN twice while in Peru. First, we went to Cusco and then back to Lima. We had no problems and have no complaints. The flight left Lima to LAX on time at 2 am. The plane seemed to be new and was clean. The food was average and service...

We flew on the new 787, and it's a creampuff. We spent the night in comfy "pods" with fluffy comforters and plenty of leg room. The seats stretch out flat, and with earplugs and eye mask, it's lights out. The food was good for an airline-- not the equivalent of Air France, but nothing objectionable.

quote: BOEING 787 TO BEAUTIFUL ARGENTINA AND CHILE
review: I must admit that I was somewhat wary of flying LAN CHILE AIRLINES based on opinions I had heard years ago. That opinion has changed and I must say that this airline has certainly come a long way as far as their equipment is concerned. We had upgraded to Premium Economy for our 787 flight to South America and although...
Great airline. More comfortable than others. Food service and entertainment wonderful. Non stop flights available from NYC

I was a little skeptical about flying on a South American airline, but I really had no choice trying to get to Cusco for the Inca Trail. Overall, the whole experience was great. We had no problem whatsoever, and the airplane was much newer and cleaner than I expected. After a few days in Lima, we were packing our bags...

quote: Flight delay is becoming the rule
review: Bad service in national flights, the entertainment service wasn't working on both flights I took, no explanation or solution as flight delays are becoming the rule.

We had a tour round Chile involving about 10 flights on LAN. Each one was on a very new, clean plane and every one was on time without any problems. The only downside was that the seats on their Dreamliners and other planes are both narrow with very limited leg room. This wasn't a problem on short internal flight but...

quote: Poorly managed airline not caring for clients in need
review:
Due to late arrival of the luggage, we (family of 4) missed the connection flight from lima to europe. There was no representative from LAN caring about our problem. There was furthermore no representative from de Codeshare Partner Iberia caring about our problem.
Both airlines: never again

Flight on time, good service in the desk and on board. Very kind flight attendants.
Good and soft landings.

quote: Traveler of any kind are not welcoming even if you are platinum
review: On the line for platinum members (with a companion) the attendant started to shout with us as if we were in the wrong line before asking if we were a platinum member (we were) or not. Prejudice, just because we weren't suit up as she thought we should be. Must give prejudice training to its employees.

Lan offers some great new planes and some old ones. This Gru - Bogota flight offers business class that does not lye flat, its the old configuration of business class. The service and food were good. Business class at Lan / LATAM still has to improve a lot to match North American / European companies (like AA) and are still...

quote: DANGEROUS Lima boarding to Cusco Ticketing & Customer Service Horrible wrong everything
review: The customer "service" ticketing agents are idiots who handle your ticketing if you do it on the phone. They don't get anything correct whether it is the Lima, Peru office or the Colombia office. We were overcharged on our credit card and they never fixed it or refunded us and I had proof that everything was incorrect. The WORST thing...
Lan airlines was unknown to me as I usually chooes BA. It was much better than expected and we had decent seats and the choice of films was okay. Food okay but not memorable

Super impressed that the airline provides "real" cutlery i.e., metal forks and knifes and not cheap plastic. The food that was provided on the flight was very nice too and their fleece blankets and pillows were very comfortable. Great that the crew were quiet and "left you alone" when 99% of the passengers were sleeping. Flight was on time.
good airline but the beverages and food its so limited, in the night its cold. Good clean and entertaiment on board
This flight was a pleasant surprise with friendly staff and some in flight food to play with. Perhaps I have been conditioned not to expect much after too many experiences with low cost carriers.

I would put this into the category of spending 13 hours in a sardine can. Many airlines are stripping valuable inches from economy seats to pack a few more in. Lantam have gone just about as far as they can although I suppose if they only allow passengers who are size 0 and 5 ft tall they can take out...

quote: Reasonable comfort for a long flight
review: Reasonable comfort for a long flight. The hour of so's break in Auckland was welcome; food satisfactory; friendly service. A bit of trouble on boarding: there had been double-booking and this caused a delay. Probably not the airline's fault and ground staff were at pains to resolve the difficulty efficiently.

I always try to fly LAN, and in this case, I was not disappointed. Being locked up for 14, yes 14, hours inside a single aircraft with other 200+ people is something difficult. This is a very long flight, but I have to say I had a good experience.
Let me start with the seat: its economy, so its not...

I think this is one of the best airlines I´ve ever had, the service is amazing, people is really kind and also everything is beautiful nd organized, by the way the coffee during the flight is delicious.

Lan Peru provided good service from Lima to Cusco and back. The short flight included a small snack, not much but it helped. The flight up was early morning; the return was mid-afternoon. Both were on time, efficient on check in and with luggage delivery. The seat was decent. The staff was quite friendly and helpful.
tHIS IS A GOOD AIRLINE BECAUSE THE SERVICE WAS GREAT AND CONFORTABLE. This is a very good airline because the service was great and confortable, also bring good price.
The flight from Australia to South America was 12 hours direct which I think is great. The staff were friendly and allowed people to walk around nearing descent to take photos of the Andes mountains.
Not many airline options when traveling within Chile, but the flight was fine. We took off and landed on time, and service was standard.

This was €150 cheaper than other alternatives but not as cheap than other airlines i'd never heard of, so we chose lan. Not a bad pick. It seems to be the SAS of south America. An old but trusrty 737 flew us nearly on schedule. Friendly service. Al. Ok.

Long haul on the dreamliner to Chile. After reading reviews before the flight I thought Id made a big mistake in booking on Lan. It was a lot cheaper than other flights to the same destination. The Dreamliner was one of the best planes and flights ive been on ( and Ive been on many flights) It departed on time,...

Having a direct flight from Lima to Orlando is very positive, especially when flying with kids since it is nonstop. Also you arrive early in the afternoon having enough time to pick up your rental car and drive to the hotel.

whenever we fly with lan, my kids ask why we go first class with them. we dont. the flight attendants are always so nice that they feel treated like "royalty". they go out of their way to help you, always smiling. This makes any flight so much more enjoyable.
we flew during peak season so airports were crowded, lines were...

Wow! Why can't we have this kind of service in the US? From the moment we stepped into the airport to getting off the plane at the other end we were made to feel cared for and like they were glad we were there. We took several flights on LAN while in Chile and this experience was consistent on each...

We had a very comfortable flight to Santiago. Were able to check in online. Priority boarding or business class makes boarding easy. Seats were the capsule type,able to lie flat. There was enough room to stow personal items close by. The entertainment system was okay although not as great a range of English movies as on Qantas. Food & drinks...

quote: FLight Cancelled without warning on return to BA from Mendoza.
review: we arrived early for check in for a 5:30 flight only to wait in line for 45 minutes and find out that our return flight cancelled without notice due to 4 planes down . THey offered to put us up for the night at the Intercontinental Hotel, a dated older establishment with casino and mall across the street. When we...

The plane was on time, the staff was helpful, the food was better than average. The personal TV and lights went out about 1/4 into the flight, which was a drag. They passed around shots of liquor after dinner. It was uneventful both ways (which is a good thing) and I would use Lam again. The prices were very good....

quote: Great flight Miami to South America
review: Great Airline second trip with them to South america - Ecuador and Peru. Great service good food lots of in flight entertainment. Dark time flights evening down and early morning home. Onetime clean personable. No language problems for US Enlish speakers

The aircraft are relatively new (this flight was on a Boeing 787), the staff are pleasant and things go reasonably well but they are generally late in departure and there is usually very little explanation. This flight was about 5 hours and met all our needs but be aware that of all the flights on what was then LAN Chile,...

I was flying from Lima to Cuzco, we arrived to Cuzco but due to climate we had to fly back to Lima... the pilot said it was not safe to land. When we arrived to Lima... caos! Nobody knew who to talk to, where to go to, etc... until the opened 2 counters for 2 full flights that came back....

No complaints about Lan really. Legroom was tight for a long-haul journey if you were taller than average. Food was good and attendants great. On board entertainment kept you distracted between sleeps. Use online checkin to avoid being separated from your companions. We got separated each time and this was annoying as we had 3 connecting flights.

The flight time was just over 11 hours but didn't seem that long at the time as the "Dreamliner" 787-9 has very good leg room for "Cattle Class". Plenty of what has become the standard in in-flight entertainment with movies, TV series, Cartoons and games. The best feature of the flight however was that it was so smoooooth. Not a...

Totally lacking with this airline. From NZ they have a reputation for never leaving on time. Our flight was delayed by 19 hours, one bus turned up to ferry a plane load of passengers to very basic accommodation and when we finally departed the food on board was disgusting! I would prefer to swim......

We has 3 flights with LAN.
1. Madrid-Santiago (Chile) in a Dreamliner 787-8.This was a horrrible flight - cramped Easyjet space for a 15-hout flight!
2. Santiago - Easter Island in a Deamliner 787-9. What a difference - there was plenty of space and everything was very comfortable. Excellent service.$
3. Easter Island - Papeete (Tahiti). Again a very comfortable...

I always get concerned when a solid airline merges with a not so solid airlines as in the case of LAN. However, this flight was fine with excellent service. Enjoyed the entertainment and relatively spacious seating.

I travel with my pet and the airline personal was excellent. About my fly everything was ok, with out problem, sit were confortable and in a regular size, the food was also ok and the place was also clean. Some time I flew in other airline were I did not have enough place to my legs: they were touching the...

It's actually only a short flight from Lima to Cuzco and most of the estimated "flight time" is actually (about 45 mins.) waiting to take off. The customer service from LAN airlines crew was excellent from ticketing counter to flight attendant and even though it was a short, you get complimentary drinks and snacks (not just peanuts/pretzels).

Excellent airline, clean, comfortable and easy check in. Service was very good and food was great as well.
Very impressed.
It was my first time at LAN and I really like. Really confortable, good entretainment and service awesome. Reccomend as an excelent option in LA.

quote: Lima terminal personnel very poorly trained and caused a real problem boarding the flight
review: The Gate crew stared loading the plane without much regard to passengers with problems in boarding. The plane was half loaded when they stopped and unloaded everyone. The told us that the plane had a problem and didn't know how long it would be to have it fixed. About an hour later, the Chilean Soccer team come into the terminal...

Personally I feel at ease with LAN for the safety. Other things are secondary, but the entertaiment works pretty fine. The app for mobiles and tablets is quite good.
The food ..... too simple, but it's ok.

quote: The Configuration on the Dreamliner is very Un·com·fort·a·ble
review:
Airlines have to maximize profits, but there limits. On a long haul fly, This aircraft is simply not wide enought to be equipped 3x3x3 . The result of this configuration is that aisle are very narrow but, most importat, seats are narrow, very narrow. Smaller than usual.
Travelled in both window and aisle seats, 11 hour journeys both ways. Plane...

quote: Confusing boarding - but quick, easy and comfortable flight!
review: The boarding process for LAN flights is super confusing. We were told to move lines twice, and ended up way in the back of a super long line just to get on a bus. The customer service agents in the airport were not helpful at all. I am an American Airlines elite member, which gives me OneWorld status, and that...

They change flight times more than once...you never know when they are going to leave for sure.
Flight attendants are lovely and helpful...food and drinks are good.
cabin is clean and seats are comfortable.
Ticket agent was very helpful and was from Cordoba.
Main problem is time of departure

the flight was from sao paulo to Malpensa, and the aircraft was the new 787
the airline was very good , the more pressure and humidity in the air of the cabin make all the difference . After 11 for flight i won't want to leave the plane
food and service it was very , very good
Very good flight. Good service on board. Even though I was on Economy class, there was plenty of leg space. There were good entertainment features on board.

quote: My favorite airline for travel to and in LatAm
review: Lan Chile (now renamed LATAM) has always been one of my favorites, due exclusively to the crew and onboard service. Planes are the same, seats with not much differentiation at the end of the day, but the service is always special. From the flight attendant offering you samples of wines before you choose, to standing in front of you holding...
This was a great flight, on schedule, really well attended, comfortable and without any trouble at all

I've taken LAN two times in the last two year to BA and Santiago, and I've used American as well. LAN has a better business class than AA, cabin better, food better. And often cheaper. Generally good schedule. Last flight on AA was on newer plane and they are getting closer, but not quite there yet.
LAN or LATAM is a very good airline. The only problem is that they usually leave and arrive late, making you waiting time a bit longer than usual. However, the service is good as well as the planes.

Short flight from Lima to Cusco that really had nothing special about it, but I did love the views from the window seat though. the flight itself was nice and short and the flight attendants were very nice and polite. The food and drinks were OK and no entertainment on the flight which was expected due to the length and...

quote: It depends of the plane model
review:
Generally international flights use bigger planes with more passenger and baggage capacity, however LATAM uses some Airbus A320 to his daily flight from Brazil to Santiago (you just have one flight from Milan that uses a B 787 Dreamliner).
For the A320 its a terrible experience once the flight it's two crowded and the company does not respect the hand...

The bad experience started when I was trying to buy my ticket, I was looking for it online but the page kept breaking down when I was trying to buy, it happened for several days and I kept receiving alerts with the same flight, so I decided to call LAN. a Colombian guy answered and it was difficult to understand...

LAN is an airline that perfectly combines care, service and prices . I always choose LAN as the main airline for travel.
To others , it has an excellent program points. With LANPASS I have been able to save me many passages .
It was a very nice trip on a boeing 787 very comfortable and with a delicious dinner. hot and tasty. Very nice and staff on board was very friendly and cordial showing the typical Chilean cordiality

Flew on this and nine other flights with LanTam Airlines while spending five weeks down in South America. One negative thing that was recovered by airline was that they had cancelled my itinerary the week before and I had to get the office in Cartagena to rebook all my flights with them. The cost came on $230 cheaper for same...
The flight was good, in every kind of things, the attention, the food, the flight indeed was very good.

This is the best airline I have ever flown. Everything from arrival at the gate to walking out of the airport was the best experience ever. The flight attendants were friendly and helpful. The equipment was modern and clean. Departure and arrival both ways were right on time. If you ever have a chance to fly LAN, don't pass it...

They delayed the flight so that I couldn't get in time to my destiny. I had to continue by car 450 km of a difficult road and wasn´t willing to do it with no natural light. Had to overslleep in Zapala and was not refunded.

quote: Good service, good entertainment on board
review: At the beginning we were so worried because we were travelling with our little baby of 4 months an a half. But at the end our fly was comfortable and relaxed. We were so lucky because the flight was not full so LAN gave us 3 seats. Our baby was happy, quiet and he slept at least 8 hours. So...
My wife and I flew off to French Polynesie last January and LATAM had an outstanding service. it was my 2nd time I travelled with them and I recommend Latam! Goos meals and good service!

Modern airplanes, proffesional atention in every request, excellent entertainment services on board and quite punctual on their itineraries.
Highly recomended. The only problem you may experience is about losing your luggage, but it is a common issue in every airline. Lost it, made a claim, and I had it back in hours!! besides they paid me for yhe delay and...

I did many flight in March/April with LAN through South America.
It was with a large group and they were very accomidating to check us in. Special line up so that we weren't annoying other passengers. The flights were decent. Some flights has better chairs than others. Leg room was no issue. We even got these included cut snack boxes...

quote: 3 hours delays and got stuck in the gate area
review: I heard many good reviews of Lan actually, but my experience with Lan was going well. My way back to Buenos Aires from Salta, I got stuck for 3 hours in the small gate area of Salta airport due to unexplained technical problem. It was terribly uncomfortable, because they didn't know when it was going to be fixed or what...

quote: Nothing more nothing less than expectations
review:
Just a normal flight without anything out of order. They flew on schedulle, pleasant attendants on board and a clean plane.
Off course to be perfect I just have to ask for better options to snack.

quote: FLIGHTS ARE ALWAYS A GOOD EXPERIENCE
review: I flight quite often with latam, mostly buenos aires-sao paulo-buenos aires, and buenos aires-miami-buenos aires. Aircrafts, staff, and service on ground and in the air is always efficent, they know how to handle my special request, like over-sized baggages, and special needs. Therefore I flight with them as my first choice, even if the ticket is more expensive

quote: Average service and abusive discriminatory and non-transparent pricing
review: I had purchased through internet for me and my wife round international trip flights Mexico-Lima and round domestic flights Lima-Cuzco, the domestic round flights were about 100 dollars for each of us, reasonable compared to prices found also in internet with other airlines in Peru. But upon checking in at Lima for the Cuzco flight we were surprised by LATAM...

quote: Good service and attendance by personal
review: Good service in the flights from Mendoza (Arg) to Cusco (Peru) wth some deays in diffeerents airports. Good attendance by personal, cordial and nice
Service and attention was OK for a short flight like mine. Almost no movement when we were over the Andes.

quote: Good Experience, but problems with Schedule
review: As always, flying with Lan is a good experience, nice on board service, clean airplanes, but also as always, delay in the departure, which cause you major problems when you have to connect (in our case, to Washington) I do not know why, but they always have last minute problems with their planes. I am not an specialist in the...

I flew Iguazu-Lima-Quito-Lima-Cusco-Lima on Lan peru..and they have many number of flights between most destinations and you are never in trouble if can book a flexible ticket so you can change your flight which will be well worth the money.
Very good leg space and friendly pleasent scsbin crew. Even though not young cabin crew they were good and efficient...
Business class in LAN is ond style, but very good. Great food and wine. I would recommend flying with LAN.

quote: I always fly LAN if I can, their service is outstanding
review:
For real, this is the only airline where I feel welcome, not a burden for the flight attendants. And I don't need much while flying.
The flight attendants are always happy to help, they include food and beverage in the flight, great selection of movies that I can see when I want, a great experience, every time.
Customer service was friendly, interior space is on average with other companies. Entertainment is really good, with many movies and play.

We flew a multi leg journey from Argentina, Peru, Chile and found every flight was delayed and late. Not one word from personnel at counter as to why or when it would ready to go. They also do not announce when it is time to board so you just have to get in line and hope you don't have to...

A complete disaster. The plain left Miami with three hours of delay. The In-flight entertainment (WiFi, TV, movies on board dis not work. The services was a disaster, We arrived a Chile and LAn s personal did not know what to do with all the people who had lost their flight.

quote: Kidnapped with U$20 meal a tooth brush and a soap .
review: Time ago, LAN was not Latam, and trying to catch all routes they can do to increase territory in the south of America, they oversold tickets.So,waiting at airport, with all baggage into plane, we have at 10:30 PM, first announcement that fly was with a delay.At 12:00 it was not a delay. It was an "engine" problem. Not to be...
Check-in was a mess and there is no order at all. Team not very friendly and did not much care about service. The Flight departed at 07:25 and the team looked like being still asleep.

quote: Its a long way to Santiago...
review: We flew the long long haul to Santiago on one of LANs new 787s - despite being 9 across seating and me being quite a big chap it was quite comfortable and the in flight service and entertainment was good. The out bound flight was packed but the return was half full so had plenty of rrom to spread out....

I have traveled on LAN several times to South America. The services has always been good. Check-in has always been smooth. They are on time. Meals are tasty. Service onboard has always been excellent. I have never had a bad experience.

This airline is really trying hard to make it to the top of mind of the latin american traveler. The crew service is great, the food is very tasty (not like the other airlines) and the planes are pretty new. The prices are very good, specially if you fly within the region. I recommend this airline to travel along south...

Great Airline with very good service.
The Dreamliner is a quite and safe aircraft and comfortabel.
Thank you LAN

quote: The worst flight of my life
review: I have been flying very often due to my work commitment. Brazilian TAM is the worst line I have ever flown with. Costumer service not existing if you do not speak Brazilian. Very rude stewardesses barely speaking English. My TV was broken all night no help. I asked for new headphone no chance. Food awful. And the worst they lost...

The Lan team did a great job in getting us checked in at the airport on the Galapagos in spite of power outages. The flight left on time, there was a warm meal served aboard with complimentary beer and wine. The luggage was delivered in a timely manner which made it easy for a tight connection. It was an impressive...

quote: Lan Chile, Excellent Start to the Trip
review: Flight Attendants gave us great service and we had a reasonable amount of room cabin wise only downfall was for my partner was the vegetarian optional for meals was not great, if you like mushroom sandwiches all good ( both journeys), otherwise order the normal menu and ask for non meat. Internal South American flights were a little more cramped...

quote: great service, clean airplanes - US carriers could learn a few things.
review: After our experience with Aerolineas Argentinas, I was not expecting much from LAN. Boy was I wrong. Customer service was friendly, courteous and professional at all levels, from check in to in flight. LAN does not charge for checked luggage, and has efficient baggage handling. As a result, most passengers checked luggage, and boarding was smooth, fast and efficient -...

I have flown LAN the last 3 times in South America, and have found them to be a very good airline. Our tour included the airfare at coach, and not being a Frequent Flyer, I did not have miles to upgrade. We still found the flight to be pleasant and on time.

This airliner reminds you of what flying used to be, with picture perfect attendants, great service and open bar. We have traveled a couple of times to Lima in the last few years, and flying with LAN has been always a real pleasure.
I have traveled with LAN within my country and outside. Their international flights have always been very punctual and the onboard service has been perfect: nice food, nice treatment.

quote: Possibly the best airline of Latin America.
review: Smooth friendly check in. Welcoming friend staff on board who actively ensured the boarding process was efficient and smooth. Nice service, good food, pretty reasonable entertainment.

Great crew great food an excellent service on our international routes
Domestic flights in South America and we had many, were abysmal. Always delayed up to 12 hours! Rude ground crew and uncaring staff
Felt sorry for locals with small children and no formula to feed them their bottles with no explanation or apologies from airline.
Shame on you LAN

quote: Highly Recommended for Flights to Ecuador (domestic or international)
review:
AMAZING! When it is economical I use LAN to travel to Ecuador from the States and within Ecuador. LAN is on time and the food is amazing! I used LAN to travel to Galapagos Island and their customer service aboard the plane was great!
Overall, very pleased!

quote: Great flight, language was an issue
review: The schedule and cost were great for our needs, but we had several schedule changes that we were NOT advised of. Once we found the schedule change, we did have to have some adjustments made since our original flight was cancelled. The customer service at that time was good. On our way home, our flight home went through Buenos Aires,...

quote: Special prices for the Sydney - Auckland sector
review: Flew on LAN due to a special price promotion on the SYD-AKL sector. Had no problems with the check in or the boarding processes and we were served by friendly staff. The onboard cabin staff were a little mechanical and while it was efficient it was not overly friendly. Flew on a new B787 Dreamliner which provided a smooth and...

It's a good company with nice and comfortable planes. Check in was quick and easy but boarding was a bit messy. Selection of entertainment is big but quite often screens got frozen while you going through menu. Food was nice, during almost 6 hours flight we got full meal, sandwich and sweets. Service could be faster. While I needed assistance...

quote: Lan lacks good Customer service @ Cali Airport
review: I have had a terrible experience with Lan's customer service at the Cali airport. The customer service attendants lack precisely sutomer service! They have a terrible attitude of aiding you to lose your flight instead of helping you to make it on your flight and place nonsense barriers which other airlines traveling to the same destinations do not do.

quote: Absolutely Horrendous experience flying with LAN
review: I was visiting Toronto for a big family event. I was carrying presents for friends and family and clothing for myself for the event. The airlines lost my luggage. Instead of being helpful and courteous, the staff was absolutely unprofessional and kept lying to me about the status of the luggage. I spent around half of my time in Toronto...

We flew with this Airline as it was arranged through our tour.
Overall, it was extremely poor and I would not use again. The food was very poor quality, and compared to Qantas very rarely provided. The seating was extremely cramped and uncomfortable. On board entertainment was not too bad, yet the service was minimal.
Our flight was Qantas, but...

Worst airline ever. I am travelling on an around the world trip. My travel around South America was on LAN. Big mistake. Whilst the plane and on board experience was ok. The baggage handling and care for your belongings is the worst ever. One of our suit cases went missing. It took LAN 3 days to track it down and...

quote: Beats taking the bus on a short visit to Peru
review: Long queue in Lima airport. Lucky we got there early. Good short flight to Lima. Was raining when we left Lima and hot when we got to Cusco. Nice flight over the Andes. Get a window seat.
This was an overnight flight. The food was good, in flight entertainment was good and I slept for 8 hours in economy!!!. Staff very helpful.

We flew with LAN on the Madrid - Santiago leg of our journey and having read reviews about the flight prior to our departure I was a little apprehensive. I needn't have worried - the flight was one of the most comfortable I have ever been on. LAN fly their 787's on the route and some of the bad reviews...
Very good service, and on time-not so cheap but Galapagos!!!People very friendly,very good Airports service!!!

Whether you fly domestic or international, they stick to the 2 bags 32 kilos each baggage allowance which is great. Everything seems to be efficient from online reservations to flying. The first time I flew LAN was from Auckland back to Sydney, the fare was amazingly cheap. I wasn't fed onboard as I was deeply asleep and I'm not keen...

I had reservation to flight from Miami to Puntacana on March, due to an emergency surgery i can't able to travel .
I'l try to contact the claim department to reschedule my reservation , per they request i sent doctor's letter, but is a nightmare they never transfer the call , the option 1 is a scam,
They never called...

Terrible experience!
This airline lacks proper customer service, procedures to deal with issues, and training of its personnel to solve problems. Our flight was cancelled due to "excess of flight hours of the crew". How ridiculous is that? Doesn't the airline have sufficient personnel to prevent its crew going beyond the maximum number of hours required by legislation?
The flight...

Very disappointing. Return flight to Aeroparque in BsAs was 3 hours late. LAN made up for it with an indifferent crew that did not go out of their way to do anything for passengers.
LAN has a long way to go. My previous LAN flight was Santiago to Miami. My luggage went to Madrid.

quote: Their ground staffs at IPC (Easter Island) are so hostile and mean to foreign passengers
review: Their ground staffs at IPC (Easter Island) are so hostile and mean to foreign passengers that I feel that LAN should do something. Five staffs at the check-in counter and only three were helping passengers. They declined to interline checked bags to SFO which is non One World compliance. The day before my return flight, there was a passenger dies...

Recently flew in Business on LAN's 787-9 between Miami and Santiago. The aircraft was brand new and the inflight service was top notch! Great and professional service from the cabin crew throughout and the wine selection was fantastic!
All of LAN's 787s have lie-flat seats in Business which is a huge plus since the other airline that flies the MIA-SCL...

Our flight was scheduled to depart at 9.45am from Lima to Cuzco. When we arrived at the airport, it was shown on the departure board that the departure time was changed to 10.10am, without any announcement or information given.
We waited at the gate until past 10.10am, flight was shown as delayed on the departure board (like finally, they were...

I have travelled with this airline to Chile and Brazil and it has been a very good experience on both occasions, inflight and ground staff are extremely helpful in Brail and Chile. The additional baggage allowance is also good as I was going paragliding and needed the extra allowance without paying extra. All the bookings were completed on line with...
The fly was ok, there was no Issues with it. The departure was right on time and we land without problems. The service on the fly it's ok.

It was a flight operated by LAN AIRLINES, from Guayaquil to Madrid, for me it was the first time flying by LAN Airlines, the meals were outstanding , using the china, metal cutlery and glassware for wine, staff were very polite and they looked very happy and confortable working for this company, It is a pity I do not have...

quote: A very good choice to flight
review:
A very good experience, beyond expected for a short flight.
They gave us a bag to put to our stroller just in case rains at destination or even the cabin has condensation.
We would recommend to depart not before 9:30 AM, because if you decide to do so, you'll have to be very early at airport and with children is...

LAN is by far the best airline operating in Peru. They do not cancel flights for no reason like LC Peru (LC Peru once told me that due to the weather LC Peru delayed their flight - whilst I looked out the window and saw LAN taking off).
LAN are very comfortable and have great staff. They are more expensive...

quote: Horrified to have bug spray sprayed all up and down aisle 15 minutes before disembarking, cloying fumes
review: As someone said, LAN ground staff was only OK but the flight attendants were super good. Food a bit under par. Leg space cramped but in-flight atmosphere very positive and comfortable. However, the insecticide spray killed it for me, I will avoid this airline. They would get at least 4.5 stars from me without that... had a headache for the...

quote: Average check in - But an Awesome flight!
review:
I chose the flight based on the price, return cost (with two checked bags as standard in the fare) was same as the 'local' airlines one way fares.
Read the bad reviews and braced myself for a nightmare experience.
Instead got an average check in experience both ends, but then surprisingly followed by a modern, well set up Dreamliner aircraft,...

Lan Chile operate a flight Auckland to Sydney and Sydney to Santago via Auckland. They operate a Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner, and having worked in an airline for over 30 years, take my word for it, this aircraft is exceptional. Air New Zealand also operate this aircraft type. The inflight lighting reflects the time of day/night. The service is good, though...

Solid and good service on this very long flight across the pacific. The food is average, but the friendliness of the cabin staff as well as the entertainment program (we flew a new Boeing Dreamliner) was excellent. A minus goes to the online check in procedure. The plane that was pictured for the seat selection was not the same aircraft...

Just flew on their 787-900.
Only a snack on this service now that it leaves a bit later in the morning that it used to.
Cabin staff are superb. Business class seat and IFE are good.
Qantas business lounge has downgraded their offering in terms of food and drink.
Only scrambled eggs and bacon (luke warm) and apple/orange juice offered.

Lan is always professional. Always. Never had a bad trip with them---with staff--had unpleasant passengers---but not stewards or pilots. Comfortable seats--good leg room. On time departures and arrivals.

quote: Excellent long distance flight with so-so end
review: Compared to other carriers to South America (they are limited anyhow and I think I need not name them), the trip with LAN was excellent. We flew in a new dreamliner, the seat distance was ok (as usual difficult for larger people) and the service excellent. A pitty (and therefore not 5 points) that they could not re-route my baggage...

Now they are combined with Tam, their new name is LANTAM. I flew with them from Rio to Foz do Iguacu. From Puerto Iguasu, Cataratas to Buenos Aires, from B.A. to Santiago de Chile, and finally to Easter island and back to Santiago. Great company, eficiant service, very comfortable and polite.

For years I have traveled with this airline and chose it when ever it was possible. No more. Our flight was scheduled to leave Los Angeles at 2 PM. When we arrived at noon, we were informed that our flight won't be leaving due to problem with the bathrooms. We were advised to change our flight to the one leaving...

quote: The Best Way to Get To Buenos Aires
review:
The best way to get from JFK or Miami is definitely LAN Chile.
It's far superior to American Airlines and the service is far better than American or Aerolineas Argentinas--or Delta.
You'll spend about two or three more by taking LAN but it's definitely better than any of its competitors, but it's worth the short extra time.

We enjoyed our roundtrip flights from Santiago to Mendoza. The views fly over the ANDES Mountains are Breathtaking!! The flight takes less than an hour and is not expensive plus it saves a lot of time. Otherwise it is a long windy, steep drive crossing the border. We have flown LAN to many, all over Argentine & Chile for years...

quote: 2 delays but it's for Machu Picchu
review: LAN is pretty good if not for the delays. Our flight out of JFK was scheduled for 12am but was cancelled (without forewarning from LAN) until 5:45am and we were already at the airport when we found out!. Luckily, we were put on another flight with a stopover instead of direct to Lima. After another one hour delay in Guayaquil,...

quote: Easy to leave U.S.A., Hard to return
review:
Leaving Miami, the flight was on time and easy. That is where it ended. Every flight after that was cancelled or delayed, BUT customer service always attempted to give my husband and I the most direct and easy solution. We ended up extending our vacation by 2 days because of this.
Airplanes and flights were average. Food, drink, entertainment, all...

Fantastic airline.
Very nice ground staff, very nice stewards as well.
Had a very good expierence. Will use definately again.
My husband and I were really impressed at the level of service offered on this airline - for a moment thought we were in first class! Keep up the great work LAN!

quote: When flying means beginning our vacations
review:
Despite the short flight (1h 30ms), I could experience the same good customer service LAN had provided to me before. No matter if they are domestic, regional or international flights, LAN has always impressed me with its good attitutde, excellent snacks/brunchs provided, etc.
I like when I fly on LAN

Just returned from a month long trip in South America. Lost count of the number of flights with Lan within South America, but would suggest some 12 or so. Final flight from Iguazu, to Buenes Aires(Argentina) then onto Santiago (Chile), Auckland and Sydney. A 2 hour delay at Buenes Aires, very little information coming from any Lan representatives, meant a...

LAN is the best. I have flown several airlines to different destinations and have found LAN to beat Southwest, US Airlines, American Eagle, and even Delta. LAN hires the most professional staff. Most speak Spanish and English. The planes are comfortable and tickets are reasonable. They provide earbuds for movies. Their snacks and drinks are more than just peanuts. When...

We flew to and from Santiago, Chile from Miami with LAN and were impressed with their service. Both were overnight flights in economy and they provided a pillow, blanket, and headphones for the individual entertainment.
Leg room was comfortable for us, and more than other airlines that we had been on. Seats were pretty comfortable. They fed us dinner, snack,...

Was not anticipating that we would be flying the very latest Boeing 787 Dreamliner to Easter Island, smooth ride. Reasonably comfortable seats in Economy. Great on board service. Very diversified entertainment system. All personnel is well groomed, polite and efficient, with maybe an exception at the check-in desk at the Easter Island airport where we felt we were literally "processed"...

quote: Efficient and ran on time, pleasant staff
review: Small plane with two seats either side main aisle. Comfortable seats for a small plane. Snacks were somewhat carbohydrate based (nuts, bar and plantain crisps) but for short flight were fine. Boarding process quick and easy.

Biggest network in Latin America, you can travel anywhere you want to go.
Flight attendants are very warm and provide excellent service.

Brisbane to Auckland went very well, then it all fell apart. Long delay in Auckland, we were told due to the inflight entertainment not working, when we finally boarded it was working so we wondered what was really wrong. Our seats were the very last row of the plane , we had booked and had confirmed seats about middle of...

quote: Lost luggage and no help from ground staff who could not speak English
review: Arrived at Sydney airport to find they had no record of our booking even though we had been given seat allocation from our travel agent. As they had plenty is seating they were able to put 3 of us on the flight. The aircraft was OK as was the service and food. Suitcases did not arrive in BA along with...

Flew LAN to Frankfurt from Madrid, a very good airline. Was very satisfied with the crew and the flight itself. The Dreamliner is a beautiful aircraft to fly on, the complimentary snack was a bonus and the in-flight entertainment was brilliant. Well done LAN :)

quote: Avoid LAN Chile if at all possible!
review: I have been flying with LAN airlines twice every 12 weeks for the last 4 years. Unfortunately it is the only airline available to get me to and from my destinations. LAN has changed my flight several times without notice and changing my seats, good seats that I had purchased months in advance. LAN Chile consistently leaves and arrives late....
LAN has it figured out. These guys are great. They are on time and the service was excellent. I would fly with them anytime.
Have traveled back and forth on LAN many times, never had a single problem. And will continue to recommend and fly.

Recently I flew from Rio to Santiago on LAN in economy. Service was below average for a 4 hour flight and seats were very confined. However the biggest gripe is that on landing in Santiago we found out (over 50 persons) that our luggage was not on the plane. LAN decided that the cargo was more important and off loaded...

quote: Business Class from Bolivia/Peru to LA - Well Worth the Cost
review: We had such a terrible experience flying home in a sardine can from Europe > N.Y. to L.A. that we decided for our trip to Peru we would fly over economy then fly back first class. You know how tired you are after a 'vacation' that you don't really want to be scrunched up flying home. So we found the...

I flight every month by Lan for more than 5 years.
I'm always flying in business class, so I can´t talk about the tourist class. But really the B- 787 flights have greatly improved in general.
As for my monthly flights in business class, much depends on the distance. For flights up to 8 hours, the seats are very comfortable,...

I've used LAN for a few times when visited South America. They gives me pleasantly surprised - staffs were friendly and cheerful, food was good and on times! Hopefully they will maintain all good works!
From beginning to end, LAN provided a professional flying experience. The flights were on time, the meals incredibly good, and the attendants courteous and approachable.

quote: Don’t book LAN Argentina (when you are a non-resident!)
review: We booked a flight with LAN Argentina in Economy N and weren’t allowed to take the flight neither did we get our money back! On the website it is stated that Economy O and Q are for residents only, but it says nothing about Economy N being for residents only. For us it is totally illogical that you can even...

I booked tickets on my credit card for my family of 8. When we arrived to check in for our flight from Lima to Cusco they had bumped 6 of us and required we take a later flight. Since we had a guide service to pick us up in Cusco this delay was a major inconvenience. As some consolation, they...
It was a thirteen hours flight, and i felt comfortable inside the airplane all the time. Higly recommend it .

Lucia - Agent in Lima...OUTSTANDING HELP.
Saved me!
Somehow AAirlines flight 918 from Lima - Miami...
Had 'lost my ticket'...
Was told by American Airlines 'you'll have to buy another ticket'..
Lucia with LAN stepped in ...and took care of it.
THANKS FOR THE going 'over and beyond'...
to be fair - LAN had to cancel my Cusco - Lima...
Absolutely fantastic service. Seats are comfortable and spacious. Food was top notch. Will fly this airline on all my SA trips

Brand new "Dreamliner" B-787. Very clean and comfortable, though a bit noisy, as my seat was right after the engines.
Very polite and friendly crew, good food, excellent service. Thank you, LAN!

quote: Bad only option most of the time.
review:
This is the worst staff I have to fly with most of the time. Unfortunately there is so short competence on their destinations.
Expensive, but there are some good deals sometimes online. Clean planes and almost none broken devices or seats. Food, drinks and lounges are pretty good. If bad weather or missed flights, no so bad company in some...
It's a great airline, the flight was right on schedule, they flight staff was very friendly and nice.

I would like to omit that the business class service has been let down. There was the choice of one meal only. And a pretty basic one too. The service was one drink.
The seat in the B787, very pretty average. Plane arrived on time in Auckland.
In general, nothing to write home about.

We flew LAN 6 times in less than 12 days(through Chile and Argentina)and pleasantly and surprisingly our travel with LAN was flawless! The flight crews were always friendly and helpful. The aircrafts were new and very clean. My husband is 6'6" and we were able to get exit row seats most of the time. On the final flight from Mendoza...
Fun flying experience in that you actually have to go west from Santiago to gain enough altitude to go east over the Andes. Fun, quick trip. Beats the eight-hour bus ride alternative.

quote: Dreamliner - much easier on the body than other planes
review:
Great plane with enough room to sit comfortable and without being squashed by the person in front if they decline. The atmosphere and air pressure is very pleasant. I usually have problems with my nose and lips drying out real bad but not on this liner.
Would fly this airline again.

We had a couple of flights with LAN during our Chile trip, all of them well organized during checkin and boarding. The crew was very friendly and served drinks and snack twice even in short flights, the seats were modern and had possibilities to directly plug in own headsets and also USB and had power plugs at each seat.
The...

quote: First class without being in first class
review: Much to our surprise, this airline serves full meals (not pretzels and peanuts), free wine and desert. And this was in "Economy class". In addition, the movies were free. Just a very good experience overall.

We flew a Boeing 787. I have never sat in such small seats and I have travelled extensively. There were three across, I was by the window. There was no moving without touching. The tray table was small and difficult to organize the food tray. Person next to me was left handed and smelled of horse poo. After 8 hours...

Great travel Experience. I would recommend flying LAN for any experience whether it be business or leisure, it is definitely worth the price. I flew to Chile earlier this year and was pleasantly surprised by the airline from the moment of checking in until I walked off the plane.

We reserved through American Airlines, but our first flight from Bogota to Miami was with LAN Airlines. To put it mildly, LAN was incompetent, unprofessional, and so rude I will avoid going to any destination that requires flying with this company.
First, our flight was overbooked because the company apparently had a canceled flight in the morning and the airline...

The service is very good and the aircraft is modern, with top of the line inflight entertainment. The food is good and the staff is helpful. They need to work on the cleaning of the aircraft. The top of the overheard compartments had a layer of dust, which means nobody ever cleans that. The floor and seats were not impeccable...

We booked our flight from Boston to Lima through American Airlines, but on the Miami to Lima leg we were put on a LAN flight which we have never flown before. We were pleasantly surprised. The airplane was beautiful and extremely clean and well taken care of. The seats were super comfortable and it had wonderful individual entertainment systems. The...

For being the biggest airline in Chile, I'm horrified by the service and professionalism of the airline. This is the fourth flight in the past two weeks and it's gone from bad to worse. Check-In is late paired with unfriendly and unfit staff at the desks. It's as though we are punished for not speaking fluent Spanish. My boyfriend and...
Found the service to be very good flight attendants helpful. The meals were quite boring. Plane was kept very clean and attendants catered to every ones needs where they could
The attendants were great,the found me vegetarian food. Yes we were fed, with actual flatware not plastic...blankets,headsets,and pillows were free too.

I travelled with LAN to south America on a Cycling holiday, unfortunately my baggage was lost, it can happen, I know , having previously had baggage go missing on a flight to China. Unlike the latter experience however, LAN have not found the luggage and after a lot of E-mailing and filling out forms they have come back with a...

As is usual for LAN, they have excellent service and a nice little snack, to tide you over, on the short hops.
Despite a delayed plane connection, my luggage even arrived with me, at my destination

We have had only bad experience with this airplane company. We had four flights with LAN in last two weeks, and three of them was not on time. Two domestic flights were delayed and nobody told us why. And also international flight was delayed, so we cant catch our connected flight. They have still some problems with online checkin and...

I took this flight from Buenos Aires (AEP) to Iguazu and back to Buenos Aires, we went to visit the Iguazu falls. The flight was about 2 hours service was excellent we were service a box of snacks and soft drinks. On the way from AEP the flight was on time, on the way back there was a 15 minute...

quote: Absolutely the best in flight service
review: Initially I was turned off by long, long check in lines. But once on board I was continually impressed. The service was outstanding and a bonus was all alcohol served at no charge. The meals were far better than US or Canadian carriers. On my trip I had the pleasure of being on 6 different LAN flights in South America....
The airline is very good but sometimes peole dont respect were the y have to be seated but after that the airline is very good<U+0001F604><U+0001F61B><U+0001F61B><U+0001F61B>

Dear tourists,
it is very unfair that , because we are foreigners, airlines LAN and AVIANCA charge us nearly 3 times the prices of similar ticket , for the sake of being foreigners. Yet, if you are peruvian, you are allowed to book on their economy and budget fare.
It is illegal in Europe to price a fare on account...
Good airline, great food , good service , great staff , good connecting flights to other Latin American cities.

We were told by our travel agent and the S.A. travel agency he consulted that our plan made a "technical stop" in Lima but we would not have to deplane. After being up all night, at 11:00 am, we deplaned with our carry-on luggage and went through security. We had no idea where to go from there to find our...

quote: LAN Flights More Comfortable than those on US Carriers
review: I've flown LAN three times now and do like the airline. On three out of the four planes we flew to get from LA to Buenos Aires, the configuration was 2 seats - 3 seats center - 2 seats. It makes so much more sense than 3 seats - 4 seats center - 3 seats where if you are on...

After nearly twenty-four hours of travel, I was about ready to collapse in exhaustion; this was just the flight I needed. LAN's plane offered seats so comfortable that I felt like I was sat in an armchair and excellent leg-room. The air-stewards were all incredibly helpful and cheerful and did their utmost to meet every passenger's needs. Arriving in Cusco,...

I worked for an airline for 15 years in customer service. I have traveled all over the world with several airlines. This is by far the worst airline. I will start with check in at the counter. When we arrived at the Miami airport we had to search for a rep to answer a question about prior online check in....

Website purchasing for a round trip ticket is dreadful with a foreign/British credit card. I had to resort to a travel agent, and not for the first time, which is more expensive!
In the air they are ok.

quote: Internal flights fine but Auckland to Santiago return woeful!
review: Just finished a seven week trip around South America, mostly on LAN flights and have no complaints about the many internal flights that we took. However, our trip out there was on a plane from Auckland to Santiago with less legroom than I have ever experienced in my numerous years of travelling. The return international flight was even worse. We...

quote: Nice planes, poor administration and management
review: No attempt was made to give me a seat with extra legroom, where on all my other flights some effort was made. On Arrival at Santiago, on time, another airplane is using our allowed gate and so we had to wait an extra 30 mins to dock. It then to another 15-20 mins to clear people from the plane, there...

quote: LAN Chile best in South America
review:
We actually flew from Santiago to Easter Island but seems Tripadvisor system not set up properly as Easter Island destination not an option.
LAN is a great airline and definitely the best service of all South American Airlines, new fleet of aircraft, good food selection, Nice wines and service is very good.
Only problem with domestic terminal in Santiago is...

LAN, your amazing, never again!
Just flown 5 legs of a journey with them and have convincingly settled them at the bottom of my “never fly” list. The only “tick” is for the pilots as we took off and landed safely, close to on-time. Pre check-in, check-in, departure gates, customer service, on-board comfort, meals and service are way behind most...

Given Lan Chile Airlines economy service was advised a not being great we found it excellent. Check in we did on line and were at bag drop early so no problem. Flight was delayed due weather but operated on time at the new schedule. Galley service was good considering this was economy - plenty of everything and delivered with very...

LAN is supposed to be a world class airline. This usually means that international travelers can purchase tickets and choose seats on line. Not the case for foreign visitors to Peru.
1. It was impossible to use my perfectly good credit card to purchase on ticket on the LAN site, because it was not "verified by visa" an exercise impossible...
I try to fly with them whenever i can. Best deals, nice food, comfortable!! But now that they have paired with TAM this new not-so-comfortable airplanes have arrived and dont like them much...

quote: Good Airplanes, Good Food, Nice staff, but...
review:
Excellent staff, food, entertainment, but unfortunately when you have a combination flight, they don't wait for you if the first plane got delay for weather conditions or something it is not passenger fault.
I have 1hr to get the 2nd flight to my final destination and I lost it because of weather. when I arrive, the 2nd plane didn't wait...

quote: Real Problems Dealing With Cancelled Flight
review: Last Friday we were due to fly from Buenos Aires to Mendoza on a LAN flight scheduled to leave at 12.35pm.The flight was cancelled at approx 3pm apparently due to a strike.Flight cancellations and strikes do happen.However,LAN was very bad in dealing with the flight cancellation-little notice to passengers,passengers slow hand clapping the LAN personnel because they didn't do anything,luggage...

This is luxury flying without paying the first-class fee. Everytime we have the opportunity to fly LAN we do. The service is outstanding, the aircraft is consistently clean and well equipped with entertainment options and comfort options such as free pillows and blankets. Never late, never a lost luggage, for us it has been the BEST. We wish it will...

modern aircraft, friendly and efficient crew and comfortable flight , despite poor leg room. Website for an English speaker not good- needs some serious work. love the App to watch films etc on own device

quote: Aircraft good, staff on board friendly and good but ground staff hopeless!
review: Go to check in at Sydney and no record of reservation even though seat and flight confirmed? Not full so seat was allocated but not the confirmed seat as requested by window. Food and service during flight OK.Connection between Chile and Buenos Aires close on impossible to get from one aircraft to the next in a different lounge in a...
Took a flight from Sao Paulo to Santiago with the 787. It is very confortable, and the crew service was very good.
THe plane was rather old and this does not give a great first impression. Food was average, check in good. Not much choice of airlines from Buenos Aries to Auckland, so I guess one cannot complain.

quote: Awesome experience on board but aweful customer service call center
review: My experience once on board was fantastic. Flight attendants were attentive and for a short flight we got a meal and a movie. However, at the counter service was mediocre but politically correct for lack of a better term. What took the ball was trying to call to change a date. #1 the policy is below the regular AA policy...

Lan is always on time. Land and air personel is friendly. Food is reasonable or better considering airline food, and they serve good wine. Entertainment is quite good. Economy seats could use a bit more space though

quote: Lima Rio changing airports in Sao Paulo? No way!
review:
When booking a fly Lima-Rio de Janeiro, or vice-versa, do not accept going Lima - Sao Paulo (Guarulhos airport) changing there to the fly Sao Paulo (Congonha airport) - Rio.
Moving from Guarulhos airport to Congonha airport can take you more than 1.5 hours and almost 50 dollars. If you use the free bus it will be worst because there...

Worst customer service by an airline ever. Flight was cancelled, no explanation, no help on connecting flights. No one at airline desks to assist through most of the ordeal that took in two days. Finally they gave us a hotel in downtown Santiago at 2:00 am. Should I ever have a choice I will never fly them again. Their communication...

LAN has decided that if you flight First Class you can't choose your seat in advance, can you believe this?
Their 800 is a shame they barely speak english and they limit themselves at reading to you what the computer says, but problem solving? Not a single chance
I asked to speak to a Supervisor and they said Supervisors don.t...

I was surprised to find out that LAN had a direct flight from Sydney to Auckland, being that it is not a "local" airline. It turns out that it was a flight that continued to Santiago in Chile. They left one of our bags in Sydney but they were able to find it and we got it back the following...

What a wonderful airline LAN is. Like TAM, their staff are so kindly and polite and the flights are on time. Efficient and prompt, that is LAN. I have probably taken a dozen LAN flights in the past two years during trips to Argentina and Peru and Ecuador and the Galápagos. The only problems I have had are twofold...once, we...

Made a reservation on the 28th of January. Mistakenly put in March instead of Febuary for return date. January 29th called to change the date and they wanted $500 to change the reservations. There were three tickets. I cancelled the reservation. I have talked to five agents live and am told 7 business days for refund or up to 15...
Good airline overall, good staff, good service. On time. They give you a little snack and drinks. Not so expensive for flights.

quote: Good Service and In Flight Entertainment
review:
Lots of medium and long haul flights with LAN in 2015 , as I traversed much of the west coast of Sooth America, as well as Sydney through to Lima and Santiago to Auckland.
Economy seating had more leg room than Etihad or Emarites and in flight entertainment was good.
One negative was getting bumped off a connecting flight from...

the service was great, from doing the check in with the machines, really fast by the way, to the inflight service, people were great.
seats really confortable, cleaness amazing, brand new aircraft.

I flew from Punta Arenas Chile to the Falkland Islands. When flying on Lan the stewardess were friendly and helpful. I had a great experience with Lan and would fly again if it wasnt for the price. It was $800.00 round trip for a 3 hour flight one way and a 3 hour flight back. Very expensive to go to...
Very good food, very friendly and professional stewardesses, very modern and clean aircrafts, very nice and comfortable seats, which is rare. A very good airline. Highly recommended!

What a surprise this trip was ,it was on their new dreamliner which is so quiet, the seat is very comfortable and turns into the best bed I have experienced on a plane The crew was very attentive and meals were of a high standard with a great choice of wines and they are quite happy to mix you a...

Plans are nice, food is really poor in business class, but the great service from the flight attendants make it a really nice trip. Check in was delayed in Santiago, not nearly enough workers to deal with the very long lines and people were quickly becoming irate. A speedy check in line for business in Santiago would sure make sense....

Not good. Messed up baggage tags for our flight from Miami, cancelled an interior flight and we spent 3 hours in the airport in Bogota while they figured out how toget us to our destination. I give them creditforhelpingour tour groupers bus to take us too unoriginal destination the coffee triangle but we arrived at 2 am.

A good local airline with limited routes, LAN Argentina, offers really good value for money with a decent service and a good schedule. The best thing to offer LAN its the chance of doing a fast check in, a good baggage allowance and the possibility of taking extra baggage into the plane. The service was okay with a small box...

quote: Great airline for South American travel
review: Very good service on clean, well maintained aircraft. Crew all appeared bi-lingual and more than ready to help. On time take off and landing.

A partner with American, the experience couldn't have been better. Check in efficient. Service great. We flew business and the seats fully recline and are comfortable. In flight service and food great. Our "priority bags actually came out first in luggage claim. The best option for travel to South America

I've flown with LAN to both Chile and Argentina in their business/first class. The flights themselves are good if not unexpectedly pleasant. The flight staff is friendly, the meals are good, the seats are comfortable, the entertainment systems are robust. I've always found the flight experience itself to be quite nice and the flights tend toward being very punctual.
However,...

quote: Good if is a long flight
review: All long flights with Lan are very good: service, food and clean. The only inconvenient I had was when I asked more water because I needed 1L and they didn't want to give to me, I had to be asking in little glasses all the time. For a 12h flight it is pretty annoying go all the time and asking...

Flying with LAN airlines was a very nice and great experience. Although the flight from Medellin to Cartagena was a short one, it was one of the most pleasant one I had experienced. I would really recommand this to any of my friends.

quote: LAN IS THE BEST IN LATIN AMERICA
review: Best service , best reclining seats, best service for check in, incredible wines, great movies, and the most important thing, for security reasons I will always fly LAN

The flight was very good as usual in LAN, but the post-sale service that the company provides is awful. They never answer the phone, they hang up your calls when they are attending you and its very unsatisfactory to try to make any cancellation or change (pf course when they sell they are very fast).

Have used LAN a lot over the past year. The planes are clean and tidy. Normally quite full most trips but you get exactly what you pay for in Economy. Meals are average but service is fun. The cabin crew love talking so you may have to wait for you meal sometimes. Their new 787-9/8 are fantastic and great for...

quote: Flights were on time, Meal was privided and very dicent for today's standars
review:
To my surprise i was moved to 5D from 24C. was nice and unexpected. I do hold gold status on the group. there was a meal nicely done for a 4:20 minute flight.
Boarding was fast and organized. the flight did have only 67 passengers on board.
The aribuss 320 did a good job getting us all home. the staff...

quote: Three terrific flights in business class.
review: We flew Miami to Santiago and then Buenos Aires to Santiago to Miami. Business class service excellent. We had one flight attendant who was a little weak in English and we are tremendously weak in Spanish but we made it work. Fully reclining seats. Excellent meals. Lots of room. Any time this airline is available we would choose them.

I have flown many different airlines. took American Airlines down to Lima. What a GREAT surprise to get on LAN
Staff was great, plane was new, very comfortable, Food was awesome
Definitely will make an effort to use this Airline again
Good service, clean, flight attendants are always willing to help, English and Spanish speaking, Also you can get your meals and drinks and wines at no additional cost.
